My maze generating code is mainly C. I think my TI Basic maze 
generating code was lost in a calculator reset. :(

I will dig for my C maze code though when I get home from school and 
send it off to you.

-sean

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower" 
<dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> > Also, dph, if you need any maze generating code, let me know. I 
went 
>  through a maze phase where I made a few programs to generate 
random 
>  mazes. I also made a maze generator for my TI89 calculator. :)
> 
> I found some code that would generate a random maze in C. 
> ( http://www.delorie.com/game-room/mazes/ ), but any other sources 
> would help.  The big issue is making sure that the user can specify 
> the width and height of the maze as well width and height of the 
walls 
>  and spaces between the walls in the maze.  I wouldn't mind looking 
at 
> more samples of code though.  What other languages did you write 
the 
> random maze generating code?
